short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monkey wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Monkey background. Monkey wallpaper background theme for animal fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Switch up your Monkey wallpaper with every new tab.
2. Choose a random Monkey background or pin your favorite in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Google-powered search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatic display of the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to your most visited sites.
8. Convenient access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for quick website access.
10. Easy entry to Google apps.
11. Direct access to More Themes.
12. Effortless sharing to social media platforms.
13. Immediate access to wallpaper downloads.
14. Quick links to gaming portals.
15. Activate animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks in your Monkey tab.
